description:
Code for the analysis of the CAM6.3 PPE on the topic of hemispheric albedo symmetry. Authors listed alphabetically. Authorship statement following CRediT (Contributor Roles Taxonomy)

  • Conceptualization: Trude Eidhammer.
  • Data Curation: Trude Eidhammer.
  • Funding Acquisition: Trude Eidhammer and Daniel McCoy.
  • Methodology: Trude Eidhammer, Aiden Jönsson, and Daniel McCoy.
  • Project Administration: Trude Eidhammer.
  • Resources: Trude Eidhammer.
  • Software: Aiden Jönsson and Daniel McCoy.
  • Visualization: Aiden Jönsson.
title: CAM6.3 PPE albedo symmetry study codes

creators.affiliation: NSF National Center for Atmospheric Research
creators.name: Trude Eidhammer
